description: A dashboard app that displays land and lot listings in Qualified Opportunity Zones (QOZ 2.0) near Alpharetta, GA. Uses mock/sample data for CREXI and LoopNet listings. Helps identify investment opportunities for QOZ 2.0 in 2027.
features: Dashboard with map view showing QOZ tracts near Alpharetta, GA
Property listing cards with details: price, acreage, zoning, tract ID, distance from Alpharetta
Filter properties by price range, acreage, zoning type, and distance
Mock data for 20+ land/lot listings from CREXI and LoopNet sources
Dark theme with professional real estate styling
